name: Legend Of The Dwarf King
description:
A game created during 48 hours, using Tobii Eyetracking Tech...

...It's AWSUM!!!!

Join the dwarf king on his epic journey to save his castle from the goblins!

Download Size: 154 Mb
Unpacked Size: 1 Gb

Design/Main Idea:
Johan Larsson

Simon Larsson
Manne Moquist
